sentences.english: Confucius' thought and theory of later generations produced profound influence.
sentences.chinese: 孔子地思惟及学说对后世发生啦极端深远地影响。

sentences.english: The new booklet is also a renewed effort to preserve WMO history for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的小册子也在努力将WMO的历史留存于后世。

sentences.english: Without doubt, in the Hereafter they will perish.
sentences.chinese: 无疑的，他们在后世正是亏折者。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter draws an outline of the influence of Florus.
sentences.chinese: 第四章评述弗罗鲁斯在后世的影响和流传情况。

sentences.english: Although he is no longer with us, his legacy will live on forever.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他不再与我们同在，他的遗志将永存后世。

sentences.english: So we can say that the Qing emperor's character policy has a profound significance to the afterworld.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇的文字政策对后世有着深远意义。

sentences.english: The forth part discusses the Yan's Family Precepts' influence to posterity.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分论述了《颜氏家训》对后世的影响。

sentences.english: Chapter 6 talks about the influence of Dong Qichang's simplicity on the following generations.
sentences.chinese: 第六章分析董其昌的“淡”的艺术对后世的影响。

sentences.english: S. , which has since greatly influenced the Japanese diplomacy.
sentences.chinese: 原敬的外交思想对后世产生了很大影响。

sentences.english: In the Jin and Yuan Dynasties, there appeared the so-called four great medical schools.
sentences.chinese: 金元时期出现了后世称为“金元四大家”的医学流派。

sentences.english: "Zuo Zhuan" impact on future generations is reflected in the history area.
sentences.chinese: 《左传》对后世的影响也首先体现在历史学方面。

sentences.english: Chapter four is about the specific critique to Zhouwengui and the influence on the later generation.
sentences.chinese: 第四章《周文归》的文章评点及对后世的影响。

sentences.english: Later, people built the Poetry and Etiquette Hall near Confucius Former Residence.
sentences.chinese: 后世在孔子故宅旁建诗礼堂。

sentences.english: Descartes' thought is the starting point of the life science afterworld.
sentences.chinese: 笛卡儿的思想是其后世生命科学发展的出发点。

sentences.english: The evaluation by afterworld will be retrospected.
sentences.chinese: 并回顾了后世对其乐府诗的评价。

sentences.english: The second segment summarizes its influence upon later generations.
sentences.chinese: 第二节，简要概述了《岁寒堂诗话》在后世的影响。

definition: to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)

the not-very-distant past/modern times, excluding recent decades/(in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919)/capitalist times (pre-1949)
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
